titleStmt.title: Rare physick for the chvrch sick of an ague prescribing excellent and most accurate physick to be given to the church which has been sicke a long time : with the names of every particular disease and the manner how she contracted them and by what meanes as also prescripts to remedy the same : humbly commended to the Parliament, those admirable physicians of the church and state.
titleStmt.author: Taylor, John, 1580-1653.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to John Taylor. cf. BM.
Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
